comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool/conduct additional soil delineation; provide design drawings and specifications for remediation/risk management of contaminated soils; provide assistance to PWGSC during the remediation/risk management tendering process; complete an Environmental Effect Evaluation with respect to risk management and remediation construction activities; supervise risk management and remediation construction activities; and provide all associated reporting at the CSC Kingston Penitentiary Portsmouth Harbour site located in Kingston, Ontario
